column4: hey, i've been using windows for...hrm...since around 3.1. planned to switch to linux not to long ago, ended up choosing Ubuntu. I was wondering on a scale of 1/10 how hard it would be for someone to atleast get the basics up and running?
i dont mind learning and searching forums and wasting a week of sleep if i have too
it is hard for first timers but after 3 days of nicotine and alcohol you love it
